title: pada malariNai
sahitya:
pada malariNai paNi manamE tiru mayilai nAthan annai umaiyin nAthan


anupallavi

  shatamalla ivvulaga vAzhvu caraN aDaindOra-parindALum aiyan


caraNam    nAm purinda nalvinaiyum tIvinaiyum anri vazhittuNai onrumilai
sAmba shivanai anbuDan paNivOrkku janana maraNa bhayamum tuyarum illai
